1.content: After going on another adventure with Morty to get an alternate universe battery, Rick decides to build a new device that he thought would make him able to read the mind of those affected by it. Rick didn’t calculate one element in his equation and it actually causes people’s heads to be exchanged. Who does Rick decide to target and what adventures will they go on?
1.title: The Beginning

info.brief_description: Rick creates a device that swaps heads. What adventures and who will Rick choose?
info.description:
After going on another adventure with Morty to get an alternate universe battery, Rick decides to build a new device that he thought would make him able to read the mind of those affected by it. Rick didn’t calculate one element in his equation and it actually causes people’s heads to be exchanged. Who does Rick decide to target and what adventures will they go on?


- Sex is allowed except for beastiality.
- Minimum 1 paragraph per chapter.
- PLEASE USE PROPER GRAMMAR!
- Enjoy
